property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around sash.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for sash.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for sash.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for sash.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for sash.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the sash should have a border.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over a sash.

element.name: Sash-Handle
element.description: The place in the middle of the sash.

state.name: horizontal
state.description: Applies while a sash is in horizontal state. This state responds to sash SWT.HORIZONTAL style flag.

state.name: vertical
state.description: Applies while a sash is in vertical state. This state responds to sash SWT.VERTICAL style flag.
